TopicTitle: Thinking about GPS trakers lately for RC Aircaft.

Articles.Content:
I am thinking about GPS trackers lately are they worth trying out?Like this one [http://www.amazon.com/Portable-Fashionable-Waterproof-Tracking-Geo-fence/dp/B00SFH6YXM/ref=sr_1_3?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1428780823&sr=1-3&keywords=tkstar#customerReviews](https://www.amazon.com/Portable-Fashionable-Waterproof-Tracking-Geo-fence/dp/B00SFH6YXM/ref=sr_1_3?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1428780823&sr=1-3&keywords=tkstar#customerReviews) ?

And I am planning on putting one on one of my radio controlled aircraft like if I lost it in another field.

A cheaper option might be a small timer with an alarm, or some kind of buzzer attached to an extra channel.

something like this

[http://www.wattflyer.com/forums/showthread.php?t=53572](http://www.wattflyer.com/forums/showthread.php?t=53572)
